  • Classes in mars.tools used by mars.tools 
    Class and Description
    AbstractMarsToolAndApplication
    An abstract class that provides generic components to facilitate implementation of a MarsTool and/or stand-alone Mars-based application.

    AbstractMarsToolAndApplication.MessageField 
    BHTableModel
    Simulates the actual functionality of a Branch History Table (BHT).
    BHTSimGUI
    Represents the GUI of the BHT Simulator Tool.
    BitmapDisplay.Grid 
    CacheSimulator.AbstractCache 
    CacheSimulator.Animation 
    CacheSimulator.CacheAccessResult 
    CacheSimulator.CacheBlock 
    CaptureDisplayAlignmentStrategy
    Interface to specify strategy for determining initial scrollbar settings when displaying captured and scaled image.
    CaptureModel
    Represents an automatic capture "event" which is enabled if the capture operation is to be performed automatically upon occurance.
    CaptureRectangleStrategy
    Interface to specify strategy for determining the size and location of the screen rectangle to capture.
    DigitalLabSim.HexaKeyboard 
    DigitalLabSim.OneSecondCounter 
    DigitalLabSim.SevenSegmentDisplay 
    DigitalLabSim.SevenSegmentPanel 
    FloatRepresentation
    Tool to help students learn about IEEE 754 representation of 32 bit floating point values.
    FloatRepresentation.BinaryToDecimalFormulaGraphic 
    FloatRepresentation.FlavorsOfFloat 
    FloatRepresentation.InstructionsPane 
    KeyboardAndDisplaySimulator

    This class defines a specialized panel for displaying a captured image.
    MagnifierImage.Scribbler

    MarsTool

    MemoryReferenceVisualization.CounterColor
